pluginstrument.author: Jason Tatum
pluginstrument.description:
Heading indicator as installed on 1997 Cessna 172R and 172S models.
Note: Unfortunately there's no dataref or command in X-Plane to control the gyro direction (to compensate for gyro drift) or to set the heading bug. In FSX/P3D there is, but somehow the sim resets your input. So only the heading bug can be set. Which is the heading bug for the autopilot.
